thread.title: Watch: Why is Salman Khan in pain in ‘Jalte Diye’ song from ‘PRDP’?
thread.title_full: Watch: Why is Salman Khan in pain in ‘Jalte Diye’ song from ‘PRDP’?

author: Deccan
title: Watch: Why is Salman Khan in pain in ‘Jalte Diye’ song from ‘PRDP’?
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 21, 2015, 16.00 pm Mumbai: After mesmerizing audiences with ‘Prem Leela’ and the title track of ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’, the makers are here with yet another brand new song!
Crooned by Anwesshaa, Vineet Singh, Harshdeep Kaur and Shabab Sabri, ‘Jalte Diye’ shows Sonam Kapoor’s love and admiration for Salman Khan. While we see Sonam in her charming self, we just couldn’t ignore the pain in Salman’s eyes.
The song portrays Sonam and Salman's sweet romantic relationship. After looking at the song, one thing is for sure, things aren't as simple as they seem.
The film’s intriguing story, where Salman will be seen essaying double role, is subtly represented in the song and if you are smart enough, you might just be able to put your finger on it.
Directed by Sooraj Barjatya, ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ is all about yesteryear’s romance and drama where Salman and Sonam Kapoor will essay the role of Prince and Princess.
The film marks Salman's reunion with Barjatya after 16 years. 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' will probably be a notch higher than his last bumper success 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan'. The much-anticipated film will release on 12 November, a day after the festival of Diwali.
Watch the song here:
